'''Rock Piles''' are objects found in [[Exploration]]. When broken, they will reveal a chest or a hidden path.

Rock Piles have three variants: {{Geo}}, {{Electro}}, and [[Phlogiston Pile|Phlogiston]].

For specific locations, see the [https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=72 Official Interactive Map]

==Geo Rock Pile==
'''Geo Rock Piles''' are {{Geo}} objects that can be broken using melee attacks and are weakest against [[Blunt Attack]]s.
{{Elemental Shield Data|Geo|1|Geo Rock Pile|cryoonly=1}}

==Electro Rock Pile==
Found exclusively in [[Inazuma]], '''Electro Rock Piles''' are {{Electro}} objects that can be broken using {{Anemo}}, {{Cryo}}, {{Dendro}}, {{Geo}}, and {{Pyro}}, with {{Cryo}}, {{Dendro}} and {{Pyro}} being the most effective.
{{Elemental Shield Data|Electro|2|Electro Rock Pile|noec=1|usage=2}}

==Phlogiston Pile==
'''Phlogiston Piles''' are unique to [[Natlan]]. Destroying one fills the player's [[Phlogiston]] meter.
